pullRequest.title: Create ADT event routes sample, add missing sync client APIs
pullRequest.bodyText: Async client had deleteEventRoute APIs, but sync client didn't

commit.message:
Create ADT event routes sample, add missing sync client APIs

Async client had deleteEventRoute APIs, but sync client didn't

nodes.bodyText: I had to add this extra command line parameter because, in order to create an event route, you must have one pre-existing event route endpoint. Creating a new event route endpoint for the user would require the control plane SDK.
This should take Context as a parameter no?
why the empty spaces? if you intend to tab in , use \t ?
